key_risks: Supply chain disruptions including material shortages and rising costs
Economic sensitivity due to reliance on cyclical industries
Regulatory compliance challenges across multiple jurisdictions
Litigation risks from intellectual property disputes and class action cases
Competitive pressures from major industry players
controversies: Involvement in intellectual property disputes (e.g., WordLogic Corporation v. nVent Electric PLC)
Class action lawsuits (e.g., David Verdugo v. nVent Thermal, LLC)
environmental_issues: Challenges in reducing carbon footprint and improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Concerns about competitive salaries among employees
governance_issues: Complexity in navigating evolving electrical safety and environmental regulations
